nodes.text: Manchucho was a male Aleena who was the King of Aleen.

During the Clone Wars, Manchucho welcomed the Wolfpack and asked the Grand Army of the Republic for relief efforts after the groundquakes. Commander Wolffe didn't understand his language so they needed C-3PO to translate his speaking.
Manchucho was a fair and intelligent king, who wanted a peaceful coexistence with the beings that lived beneath the surface of Aleen.
